name: Alisa C64
description:
My first ever C64 game. Fully written in Basic and compiled with Mospeed.
This game is based on my main project: Alisa.





This game is the end result of a learning process. I started of learning graphics and then the rest. So the gameplay came last and it might not be the greatest fun you'll ever had. It's very basic (lol) : p

Download the game.
And use an emulator to play it.
In case you don't want to download an emulator,
simply use the online emulator here: 
https://virtualconsoles.com/online-emulators/c64/

Both keyboard or joystick can be used to play.
Keyboard controls: WASD to move, SPACE for action.
